sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAMSBURY a town of the county of Wilts, in the hundred of its own name, and 70 miles from London, is situated on the river Kennet- It once had a market, which, however, has declined. The population amounted in 1801 to 1963, in 1811 to 2095, in 1821 to 2335, and in 1831 to 2290.
